project.name: J-C023A-JENA-02-ST03-DT01-DF07-CF17-01
project.description: Test will take in a value that is a path to a file under the working directory that will then be displayed. The path isn't checked for ../ characters and as a result will display files outside of the current working directory.

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="random-file" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-01 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
